about_the_game: Tilt and jump your way out of the depths of a grand city. A difficult game where falling is your biggest obstacle, get used to starting over. Don't get too tilted in the demo :)
detailed_description: Tilt and jump your way out of the depths of a grand city. A difficult game where falling is your biggest obstacle, get used to starting over. Don't get too tilted in the demo :)
name: Get Tilted :) Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (10.0.19043)
  • Processor: i5-8th Gen CPU or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 with updates
  • Processor: i5-11th Gen CPU or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Tilt and jump your way out of the depths of a grand city in this exhilarating demo for Get Tilted! :)
